scenario_name: Inactive Team Members License: Low-Cost License Unused
description: User with the cheapest Team Members license ($60/month) who is completely inactive for 150 days. Still worth flagging since any unused license wastes money, though savings are lower.

expected_recommendation.rationale: User has zero activity in the last 150 days. Even though Team Members is the lowest-cost license, the unused license should be reclaimed.
